meanings.definition: Keep away from or stop oneself from doing (something)
meanings.sent1: I always try to avoid eating too much candy.
meanings.sent2: She decided to avoid the busy street to stay safe.
meanings.sent3: To avoid a stomachache, I must resist the temptation of sweets.
meanings.sent4: He skillfully avoided the topic during the conversation.
meanings.sent5: Avoiding unhealthy snacks is key to maintaining a balanced diet.

meanings.definition: Prevent or try to prevent (something) from happening
meanings.sent1: The doctor advised him to avoid strenuous exercise after surgery.
meanings.sent2: They put up signs to avoid accidents on the slippery floor.
meanings.sent3: To avoid a disaster, we must act quickly and decisively.
meanings.sent4: She tried to avoid any misunderstandings by being clear in her communication.
meanings.sent5: Avoiding conflicts can lead to a more peaceful environment.
